messages.msgSnippet: I ll tell Lisa you said so!  She also sells home-made skin-care products, all natural ingredients.  She s in Oregon, so if you can get to any of the country
messages.messageBody:
I'll tell Lisa you said so! She also sells home-made skin-care
products, all natural ingredients. She's in Oregon, so if you can
get to any of the country fairs around there, you might find her.
This is a shameless plug for my bestest bestest friend <g>

Tracy

On 19 Jul 2000, at 17:30, Nanci and Thomas Kuykendall wrote:


Tracy, I just wanted to say...THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK
YOU!!!!

This website is wonderful. While not as large as I am
sure it will be one day, it is full of many more things
than Pagan Childcare. It has Playgroup listings,
family ritual and holiday activities, links to Pagan
homeschooling and Unschooling Website and message
boards, and many other things. It is a wonderful thing
for a Pagan family like ours. Thanks again!

Nanci K.

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] OT  pagan childcare
messages.msgSnippet: ... Tracy, I just wanted to say...THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!! This website is wonderful.  While not as large as I am sure it will be one day, it is full
messages.messageBody:
>This is off-topic, I know, but I know there are a few Pagans on here
><g> ......A friend of mine has a website
>Tracy


Tracy, I just wanted to say...THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!!

This website is wonderful. While not as large as I am sure it will be one day, it is full of many more things than Pagan Childcare. It has Playgroup listings, family ritual and holiday activities, links to Pagan homeschooling and Unschooling Website and message boards, and many other things. It is a wonderful thing for a Pagan family like ours. Thanks again!

Nanci K.
